WebCamp 2014, Zagreb, October 4th & 5th, 2014

Technology oriented conference for
developers & designers

⋆ October 4th & 5th, 2014 • Hypo Expo XXI • Slavonska ave. 6 • Zagreb ⋆

WebCamp Zagreb is a tech conference built by community for the community. With more than 600 web developers & designers attending last years conference, the concept of sharing experiences and knowledge across different communities in South East Europe becomes even more apparent. This year all talks are in English.

Preliminary schedule

28.08.2014.

Announcing a preliminary schedule for Week of WebCamp events.

See schedule »

Announcing the 2nd conference day

12.08.2014.

The crowdfunding campaign ended yesterday at midnight, and we’re proud to announce the second conference day at this year’s WebCamp Zagreb conference. We’re now bringing you the third round of speakers. Read more about it »

Announcing the speakers line-up

07.08.2014.

CFP has ended on August 1st, and with 105 proposals submitted, we are very positively surprised by the outcome. As we sat down to do the selection, we knew it wouldn't be easy and that many great talks will fall below the line. Still, even greater talks will bubble up to the top and we’re sure we’ll be delivering an awesome event for all our visitors. Read more about it »

The first talks, Supporter Packs, English only, and much much more

07.07.2014.

We at WebCamp Zagreb are really happy to say that the interest for the conference has been excellent. We’ve received over 50 talks proposals in our first CFP round, plus we’ve cooked up some new ideas we’re announcing right now. Get ready for the first batch of speakers, plus supporter packs and a 2-day conference + a day of workshops! Read more on the about page »

Call for papers 2014.

26.05.2014.

WebCamp Zagreb is proud to announce that the call for papers is now open. As a tech conference organized by the community for the community, your participation is greatly appreciated. Become one of our speakers.

HURRY UP: First 30 submissions will get a ticket before the general public!

Start of WebCamp 2014 preparations.

18.05.2014.

Encouraged by past WebCamp Zagreb success, we are continuing our tradition: organizing a tech orientented conference by the community for the community.

With more than 600 web developers & designers attending last years conference, concept of sharing expiriences & knowledge across different communities in South East Europe becomes even more apparent: this year we are targeting more talks in English!
